entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • On Linux .NET 6, get unexpected AuthenticationException with HttpWebRequest and wildcard usage #96360
  • Handling Data Loss in ClientWebSocket ReceiveAsync in C# Blazor WASM #96359
  • Unable to run an MVC application using Docker Desktop #96355
  • Web API performance regression after upgrading from .net framework 4.7.2 to asp .net core 6.0 #96351

Closed

  • DotNet doesn't respect encoding of Chinese strings? #96348
  • Intermittent `!AreCetShadowStacksEnabled() || UseSpecialUserModeApc()` assertion when embedding CoreCLR #83437
    Future
  • JsonSourceGenerator InvalidOperationException Unreachable with C# 12 using alias #96313
  • IpAddress subnetwork support #96356
  • Can not create folder when path exists #96353

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement remaining ILGenertorImpl methods, excluding scope. Add max stack calculation for branching. #96362
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Clean up illink suppressions #96361
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Investigate #96336 #96358
    needs-area-label
  • Limit `PNSE` by using Invariant `SortKey` in `HybridGlobalization` #96354
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Skip address for x64 prefix parsing #96352
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • Merge remaining JIT tests #94444
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove arm64 neardiffer hack #96266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update coredistools #96286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update MicrosoftNETCoreCoreDisToolsVersion to 1.3.0 #96291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE] Investigating impact of a change. #96350
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow specifying IndentCharacter and IndentSize when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Intrinsify Interlocked.And and Interlocked.Or on XARCH #96258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Faster lookup for method infos on Windows. #96283
    os-windows, tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #53063
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #53062
  • Application State in BlazorApp .Net 8 #53061
  • Omit body parameter validation when binding fails #53058
  • Blazor Text Page: Issue with Displaying Russian Text in Source Code #53056
  • [SupplyParameterFromQuery] property not being set during OnInitializedAsync #53055

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #53045
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #53053
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #53054
  • When razor page uses InputDate, the use of the time format is invalid. #49873
    Planning: WebUI
  • RDG does not support [FromQuery] for optional parameters #52315
    9.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • Verify cache #53064
    area-signalr
  • Harden SignatureEquals nullability checks #53052
    area-networking
  • Throw if resolving keyed service from non-keyed container #53051
    feature-rdg, area-minimal

Merged

  • Skip npm get-version to unblock builds #53032
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `530d5c8` to `dddb219` #53057
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Avoid setting incompatible default value for StringValue sources #52895
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix up formatting for generic types with nullable args #53049
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [release/6.0] [Blazor] Fix duplicated place holder in log message #53009
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, 6.0.x
  • Add explicit null checks on ObjectPool.Return rather than triggering random failures later on #52935
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #52908
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Force Logout API to get SignInManager from services #52949
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't get past splash screen on Android #19624
  • Android FlyoutPage does not display navigation bar NET 8 #19623
  • Not able to change the color of scroller and also scroller is not getting visible on verticalScroll="always* #19622
  • Bottom View under the shell #19621
  • win: can not scroll the horizon scroll bar on collectionview #19620
  • Scroll view content not rendered properly while dynamically adding the layout on view (iOS and Mac). #19618
  • Differentiate Left/Right click in PointerGestureRecognizer #19617
  • TableView bugs #19616
  • PagerControl for big screen device #19615
  • [iOS] MAUI Theme breaks when system prompt visible #19614

Closed

  • toolkit:MediaElement does not start when asked to play. #19587
  • can't compile on vs for Mac with .net 8 due to missing supporting packages #19555
  • Inaccurate results when getting the user's screen dimensions for macOS #19526

PullRequests

Created

  • Generalize HideSoftInputOnTapped on Android and iOS to support 3rd party input controls #19626
    community ✨

Updated

  • iOS/CollectionView - Remove GetSizeForItem and use newer AutomaticSize #19529
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Remove calls to scoped services on root provider #19593
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Resizetizer Regex Fix #19600
    area/single project ☝️, community ✨
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale, memory-leak 💦
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, stale
  • Fix TableView rendering on Android #19473
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • [X] CSS specificity #19335
    area/Xaml </>
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unnecessary `IS NOT NULL` filter on unique indexes for TPT tables on SQL Server #32689
  • Rework how using statements are generated in model snapshot #32687

Closed

  • Improve pruning to properly support ExecuteUpdate #31407
    9.0.0
  • Prune all SelectExpressions, not just those in Tables #31083
    9.0.0
  • is ExecuteUpdateAsync bug？ #32684

PullRequests

Created

  • Upgrade the snapshot when rolling back to a migration from a previous version #32690
  • Tiny cleanup in SelectExpression.ApplyPredicate #32688

Merged

  • Redo SQL tree pruning #32672

Updated

  • Track prunability of inner joins on the expression itself #32674
  • Prune SQL Server OPENJSON's WITH clause #32673
